Simple 3d

22 Sep 1999

For simple 3D images, try using xara 3D (an app that renders and animates text) or something similar, and use a dingbats or webdings font (or whatever stupid name they have). You can find some cool symbols in these fonts and you can output animated gifs for rollovers and stuff.
